title: Why is Twisted Fate disabled?
body:
"Network Operations – 24 minutes ago
We have disabled Twisted Fate due to in game issues, and are currently working on a resolution."

replies.body: We're seeing some weird interactions with Pick a Card and certain items, plus Pick a Card empowered attacks occasionally vanishing while putting the spell on CD. Currently working on a fix with the goal of getting that out as soon as it's ready and tested.
This explains a lot. I was facing TF yesterday, he red carded a minion group and nothing happened.
And now with Kled out and doing INSANELY well even in the hands of first-timers... we need someone with CC like TF's. `-`
Good way to make an off topic post.
Yeah I agree with you about dynamic que, Riven buffs, pink ward issues, and whether or not yasuo is op.  I may have missed a few of the popular topics.

> We're seeing some weird interactions with Pick a Card and certain items, plus Pick a Card empowered attacks occasionally vanishing while putting the spell on CD. Currently working on a fix with the goal of getting that out as soon as it's ready and tested.

Just curious why its taking longer then usual? I it still being tested or something?
Probably has to do with all the recent changes, the patch, Kled, and Project event.
Can we please get an update on this? It's now 4 days since TF was disabled.
its been 3 days, how long now?
5 days
Not even TF could drew a green card for that.
is there a specific item? like lich bane or something?

okay i have never ran into this ever, the only time anything close to this has happened was againt fizz and he trickeresed even though i went through the animation. please remove that, or tf shouldnt cast the pick a card if fizz does trickster
WHEN WILL HE BE BACK!!!!!!!!!
1 week

It's been

One week since they cut TF

Pick A Card been acting up with itself

Five days since I won a game

All these other champs are just plain super lame

Three days since I was banned

Super salty over the loss of my favorite man

Yesterday, they re-instated me

But it'll still be two days before I play some League
I haven't won a game in 5 days because of AS TF.

Riot instead balancing champions just go all in for TF bugs.. {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3152}} and fix him

Just use the version control and put him back where he was man. Who presses E while recalling with TF? In fact, who even presses E with TF?

No TF No Leauge
You can_ press_ E while playing TF?

You can. And apparently it was cancelling recall which RIOT fixed in last patch. I wonder how long it is going to take to fix it. 3 days without playing TF. 

If league is life, TF is wifi.

http://slowcoustic.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/I-dunno.png

Is there estimate to when hes back??? i just got mastery 7 and he was disabled immidiately after
me too, i just got it mastery 7 then he gets disabled right after, and somewhat they are still working on him
because he took an arrow to the knee
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I hope TF will be back in the game soon, I need my pickacard fix... {{champion:4}}

Yeah, as of yesterday everytime I had a gold card selected, sometimes TF would stop the throw animation at weird times, like he auto-canceled by himself. I thought I just clicked the champion again but I don'tr ecall doing that and right clicking a champion again shouldn't auto cancel, but I thought it was just my fault those times..

But, hopefully they fix it soon! :) TF is one of my go-to mid laners!
i noticed yesterday that twisted fates gold cards werent working properly after he got CC'ed
but why tho

Yeah i was in-game when he was disabled, the problem i was noticing ( and my opponent quickly picked up on it) was everytime i went to throw a blue card at a minion the minion would die before i threw the card, normally he would throw it as the minion died during its flight and the effect would activate and i would get my mana OR the minion would die and nothing would happen but in this case he was starting the animation, not throwing the card and the minion would die so he would stop throwing but i lost the card and mana, and i got decimated for it.
